mapper.sql: integral_deduction_info_id, deduction_type, max_deduction_amount, commodity_id, create_at, update_at, commodity_attr_id
mapper.select: select max_deduction_amount from czb_integral_deduction_info where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into czb_integral_deduction_info (integral_deduction_info_id, deduction_type, max_deduction_amount, commodity_id, create_at, update_at,commodity_attr_id) values (#{integralDeductionInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deductionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxDeductionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commodity_attr_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT CASE t1.deduction_type WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT commodity_title FROM czb_wechat_commodity t2 WHERE t2.commodity_id = t1.commodity_id) WHEN 2 THEN (SELECT account FROM czb_direct_charging_commodity t2 WHERE t2.commodity_id = t1.commodity_id and t2.commodity_type=1) WHEN 3 THEN (SELECT account FROM czb_direct_charging_commodity t2 WHERE t2.commodity_id = t1.commodity_id and (t2.commodity_type=2 or t2.commodity_type=3)) WHEN 4 THEN (SELECT goods_title FROM czb_equity_payment_commodity t2 WHERE t2.goods_id = t1.commodity_id) END AS "commodityTitle", CASE t1.deduction_type WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT t2.extra_sale_money FROM czb_wechat_commodity_attr t2 WHERE t1.commodity_attr_id = t2.commodity_attr_id) END AS "extraSaleMoney", CASE t1.deduction_type WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT CONCAT(t3.name,":",t3.content) FROM czb_wechat_commodity_attr t2 JOIN czb_attribute t3 on t3.attribute_id = t2.attribute_id WHERE t1.commodity_attr_id = t2.commodity_attr_id) END AS "commodityAttr", CASE t1.deduction_type WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT t2.sale_price FROM czb_wechat_commodity t2 WHERE t1.commodity_id = t2.commodity_id) WHEN 2 THEN (SELECT account FROM czb_direct_charging_commodity t2 WHERE t2.commodity_id = t1.commodity_id and t2.commodity_type=1) WHEN 3 THEN (SELECT account FROM czb_direct_charging_commodity t2 WHERE t2.commodity_id = t1.commodity_id and (t2.commodity_type=2 or t2.commodity_type=3)) WHEN 4 THEN (SELECT t2.selling_price FROM czb_equity_payment_commodity t2 WHERE t1.commodity_id = t2.goods_id) END AS "salePrice", t1.integral_deduction_info_id AS integralDeductionInfoId, t1.commodity_id AS commodityId, t1.deduction_type AS deductionType, t1.max_deduction_amount AS maxDeductionAmount, t1.commodity_attr_id AS commodityAttrId, t1.update_at AS updateAt FROM czb_integral_deduction_info t1 WHERE 1 = 1
and t1.deduction_type = #{deductionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (t1.update_at <= #{overDate} and t1.update_at >= #{beginDate})
ORDER BY t1.update_at DESC
